Nothing to see here eh @EnvAgencyMids & @RedIndustries2? Just a damning letter describing how the toxic gases from Walley‚Äôs Quarry affect Staffordshire‚Äôs Fire and Rescue Service. I‚Äôd put that on the top of any risk registers you have (if you have any of course). #stopthestink https://t.co/avCr11feZn

*NOW* Our #THYMEproject @ResEngland @EEIatHull @GeoTU1 ‚û°Future Soils Workshop‚¨Ö. Exploring optimisation of agricultural soil management for crop health, water quality, reduced runoff & net zero. Awesome programme @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @NFUtweets @SustainableLsps @YorkshireWater https://t.co/6gfa1qckHF

The @EnvAgency deadline has passed and Walleys Quarry still stinks ‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è what happens now @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @MPGeorgeEustice @AaronBell4NUL @SimonTagg @BorisJohnson? Our children are breathing toxic air, when will it stop? #stopthestink

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

@TheRealMother2 @scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @WHO No doubt in my mind that @EnvAgencyMids have been turning a blind eye to what‚Äôs been going in to the Landfill and now it has bitten them in the arse! Hopefully the publicity will now force them to reveal the full extent of @RedIndustries2 mischief and prosecute!

Benches, bike racks and habitat created near St Andrews Wetland to manage #flood risk and increase biodiversity @EnvAgencySW @kiergroup @MottMacDonald @SBFL_CN @AECOMEnvWater @CornwallCouncil @WestcountryRT @UniofExeterESI @SouthWestWater @CwllCFloodForum 
https://t.co/q7TorhflkG https://t.co/z6HICR1fsc

Any Ecologist with an ounce of experience can see immediately how farcical this is! Plus of course a S1 licence is needed to go near a Cetti‚Äôs Wblr nest or risk prosecution. I highlighted this to the project partners. They tell me they have no choice! @Natures_Voice @guyshorrock https://t.co/x5ccnpk851

@WiseBirding @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @NESouthWest @ChrisGPackham @Natures_Voice @DevonWildlife Very well done for being so proactive and caring Chris, most of us want this project but not at the expense of breeding birds and other critters so thank you from them all üëç

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

@Fi_Flynn @LoneRanger77777 @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @PHE_uk you tell me hand on heart truthfully and in full knowledge of the FACTS that this is not harming the women and newborns. Can you also guarantee there will be no residual health conditions in the babies as a sequelae down the line?
#StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

Unfortunately @PHE_uk and @EnvAgency not interested in women‚Äôs health if you‚Äôre from #newcastleunderlyme Pregnant women suffering, women in labour giving birth whilst being poisoned by noxious gas from #whalleysquarry #StopTheStink #TalkWomensHealth

@SianieRoo @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @DefraGovUK I've just vomited in the kitchen. I've had an increase in headaches, migraines, and sleep deprivation, but I've never vomited because of the odour before üòî What a way to start the work day üëç Positive news can't come soon enough.

*This* is why we have a phosphate pollution problem in Herefordshire rivers. Massive pile of chicken muck dumped right next to watercourse. Completely against the farming rules for water. I‚Äôve just reported it to @EnvAgency.  Totally unacceptable.  And not an isolated incident. https://t.co/1l45pAbllG

tweets.text:
The failure of the @EnvAgency @
@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA to issue any communication re the landfill capping situation (deadline was last Friday) is utterly unforgivable given they are painfully aware that the community is at the end of its tether. @DefraGovUK #stopthestink

@AlanDaviesbirds @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs lazy thinking, no thinking or not caring thinking. A mixture, maybe. Wildlife is attacked on all sides. Where would we be without all of its defenders?
